page.title: 15RISELEY CUBS(2)
page.content: We have three leaders who are Akela, Raksha and Chil. We have three sixes - blue, yellow and green. There are many things which we do over the year from playing football against the other cub packs in the district to cooking competitions. This year from September l984 to September l985 Riseley cubs have won a sports shield at Colmworth, come joint first in the football and won through to represent the District in the county at the Camp Cooking Competition. We also go camping. This year the boys have been to the district camp at Great Barford and also a weekend camp. There will be another weekend camp with the scouts at the end of the summer combined with a barbeque. This will also raise funds.
